attributes.action: raise the tax threshold on pensions to at least £9,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The basic state pension gives older people the lowest income of their whole lives at a time when they need a few more comforts, not less, and unless they have very high private pensions, they remain below the poverty line, and yet pay tax which reduces their income further.   If they work a few hours that is taxed too making life as a pensioner extremely hard.
